title: I can't access league of legends on my laptop at all?
body: So league of legends just stopped working one day, it normally has the writing in red when when I'm offline and it wasn't, but every time I put my information in it would go to red and say I'm offline. So i was going to uninstall and reinstall, but I can't access league of legends websites at all either. All that loads is the background image, I have no way to download league again. I had to use my phone to make this discussion, so what exactly can i do then? :( thanks for reading

replies.body: Hey, it sounds like something is blocking you from reaching our sites or services.  Could be a few things here like an antivirus, firewall, or port.  Our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help auto-configure firewall settings.  I also recommend trying a [port forward](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to help make clear out those blocks.  Let me know if it helps!

What do you mean by port forward? And how do I use the hextech repair tool? I uninstalled league of legends. Isn't it in the settings tab? I don't even know where to start, how do I reinstall league if i can't access the website at all? x.x thanks for your help (:

Hey there, a port forward can help restore comms with our services that might be blocked by your network.  The steps in that guide can help make sure the block is cleared.  The repair tool is an application that will perform a variety of tasks not available in the client, but it won't be much use until the client is installed.  If the issue continues though, reach out to us directly via support@riotgames.com.  Our tech team will check into this with your directly and find more options.
